mapper.select: select * from charginginfo where statId = #{statId} order by chgerId

select distance, statNm, busiCall, stat, lng, lat, statId, addr from (select u_st_distance_sphere(POINT(#{centerLng}, #{centerLat}), POINT(lng, lat)) /1000 as distance, statNm, busiCall, stat, lng, lat, statId, addr from charginginfo) as x where distance<#{distance} group by statId order by distance
select * from charginginfo where addr like concat('%', #{addr}, '%')
select * from charginginfo where statNm like concat('%', #{statNm}, '%')
